item.title: Jensen Huang says investors got it wrong over DeepSeek stock sell off that wiped $600bn from Nvidia
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has addressed a market selloff that wiped $600 billion off his company—and caused his personal wealth to plummet.

item.title: JFK Library shuts down due to Trump firings, then reopens
item.description: Chaos saw visitors being escorted out of the building.

item.title: Trump Media board approves an investment fund to explore acquisitions
item.description: Trump Media wants to add more businesses in what it calls the “America First Economy,” according to an SEC filing.

item.title: MrBeast says built his $700m YouTube empire on the ‘purple cow effect’
item.description: MrBeast, aka Jimmy Donaldson, has cracked the code for YouTube stardom—but says his success won't be easy to replicate.

item.title: Tesla recalls more than 375,000 vehicles due to power steering issue
item.description: The loss of power could require more effort to control the car by drivers, particularly at low speeds, increasing the risk of a crash.
